Question
========
  
A repeated measures ANOVA finds a significant interaction effect for Time*Sex. What does this effect mean? 
Answerlist
----------
* The effect of Time is no longer significant when controlling for Gender.
* The effect of Time depends on Gender.
* The effect of Time is significant for both Gender.
* The effect of Time is independent of Gender.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
